comments.en:
This printer is the same hardware as the BJC-2000, only the contents of the retail package is different. So one can use the drivers as listed on the BJC-2000 entry page or choose the "BJC-2000" as one's printer model in printer configuration programs.

Consumables/Refills: BC20 $36.99 BC-21e $52.99 BCI-21Bk $8.99 BCI-21Clr $21.99
